titleStmt.title: Usury at six per cent. examined, and found unjustly charged by Sir Tho. Culpepper and J.C. with many crimes and oppressions, whereof 'tis altogether innocent wherein is shewed the necessity of retrenching our luxury, and vain consumption of forraign commodities, imported by English money : also the reducing the wages of servants, labourers, by Thomas Manley, Gent.
titleStmt.author: Manley, Thomas, 1628-1690.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Thomas Ratcliffe, and Thomas Daniel, and are to be sold by Ambrose Isted ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
